review_text: The Sunflower Cottage was a beautiful getaway very peaceful and quiet .I really loved my stay there!!and Libby was a very considerate and responsive host, she was always available if you needed her Thank you again Ms Libby for allowing my stay!!I will be back.again

I really enjoyed my stay at Libby's cottage. Very peaceful and cozy. So restful to sit outside in the back and relax. Nice little fire pit for the evenings when the temperature drops. Cottage has everything you need. Nice area to walk around in. Has a country feel to it but is also close to town.
Libby was a great host, right on top of things when we needed her, and left us to our privacy when we didn't. Thank you very much for letting stay in your cottage.
Amazing host. Extremely accommodating, and very responsive. Property is gorgeous, and the cabin is as cozy as it gets.
The house was just as described with all the amenities. It was right on the river and was very private and quiet.
Such a cozy place to stay in Clarksdale. Will definitely be back!
We liked the location and felt safe there. It was peaceful being out a ways. We had good communication with Libby.
Awesome and cozy cottage with an amazing host!

This was my second stay at the sunflower cottage. Libby was an excellent host and hospitable, especially during the recent snow and freezing winter storms, even offering up soup. She also directed me to hundreds of movies to choose from in case of boredom. I would stay at the cottage again when in the area without hesitation.
Quiet and peaceful

I chose this place because I needed to work away from home for an extended period and needed to bring my dog. There was plenty of room and space for her to run. The area seemed more than safe, secluded yet close to town and work. I would stay again, as a matter of fact have already booked for next month. Home away from home and great if you have pets.

I loved this little house. It wasn’t hard to find, easy to access , and it was just as described. It was neat and clean had everything you needed plus lots of extras.. Our hostess was very responsive and full of information about the area.. it was in a nice area .. quiet and private.. cozy and comfortable.. bed was great! We spent lots of time just talking and looking out the big windows and enjoying the view of the property on the Sunflower river… We love something little different.. not same old thing…. Great little home.. will stay again !!! Ricky and Elizabeth R.
Excellent hosts. Great communication before our check in and accommodations were awesome. Will definitely book this again next time in the area.

Small intimate cabin, well appointed with everything you could possibly need. Private property with great outdoor seating and lovely views. Libby was such a generous and thoughtful host, providing us with great information about the area. We would love to come back for another stay
Calm and peaceful. Almost expected to see deer in the pasture.

This is the cutest, quiet little get away. We enjoyed the stay very much! Libby is a fabulous hostess and offered lots of assistance and helped us get to know her space. I highly recommend this sweet get away!! You won’t be disappointed!!

We loved this little house, so cozy and comfortable. We came from a music festival in Nashville on our way to New Orleans and just wanted something a bit quiet and peaceful on the way and it was just perfect. It has comfortable beds, great sofas and chairs, well equipped kitchen and very nice decorations and relaxed athmosphere.
Real Delta experience. Cozy and sweet cottage in the middle of the nature close to the Sunflower River. For the ones like me who likes such things, it's the perfect location!
Libby was great and cottage made us feel at home the minute we walked in!
We really enjoyed our stay at Libby’s. Lots of outdoor seating.
Great quiet spot. Easy access to main highway and off the beating path, all in one.

Absolutely adorable little cottage right up against the river. Quiet and peaceful. The cottage was well-stocked and cozy. Lots of fresh linens and comfy places to sit, and a large bed. Exactly what I was looking for for a weekend away to write. Libby was very kind and responsive and allowed flexibility with my check-in time. I would definitely stay again.
another great stay while we worked out of town
nice quiet cottage. worked out great with how close it is to the city!!
Perfect location! Great WiFi. Beautiful view! Everything was great
Very safe.. quiet. Would stay here again
Lovely little tucked away spot.
Description of the cottage is quite fair and accurate. I had a nice 4 day getaway and felt right at home and comfortable there.
Libby’s place was easy to access. She was very responsive. Easy communication and very accommodating. I would definitely come back.

Entry instructions with pictures were perfect. Cabin was as you would expect for a fishing/hunting cabin in the area. Comfortable furniture and bed and decorated like a family’s retreat. Coffee, condiments, and basic toiletries were well supplied. The area is very quiet even with very close neighbors. I would stay here again when in the area.
It was a very nice cottage. Thank you.
The Sunflower Cottage is very peaceful and private. We enjoyed the view overlooking the River.
Quiet, private location next to the river, but still close to attractions. Clean and comfortable - highly recommended.
My family loves Ms. Libby’s place. The view is lovely and she’s really nice. We forward to coming back real soon.

The cottage was just as described with a wonderful view of the Sunflower River. It was quiet, peaceful, and private. Even though it was frigid outside (highs in the 40s /lows in the 20s), the cottage was cozy and warm. The bed is just as comfortable as others have described.
I saw a deer and tons of bird life from the cottage windows during my stay. The full kitchen was handy and the water was piping hot, which was much appreciated after a long day of hiking in the cold. Host Libby was easy to communicate with and very responsive during my stay.
Libby is an awesome host. She is easy to communicate with and quick to respond to any question or need.
The place was a fantastic location for exploring Clarksdale but also having a bit of a rural vibe. Communication was great. Really loved the porch and could have used some more time relaxing there.

Fun shotgun shack that has been beautifully appointed with an eclectic mix of antiques and new furnishings. Wonderful appliances, a very pretty view of the sunflower river and comfortable places to sit outdoors. Libby has a nice listing of all the local restaurants and night spots. Would definitely recommend this place for your enjoyment when in Clarksdale.
Great location - comfortable - good value
Great place to stay in Clarksdale! Spacious small cottage with lovely view, porches, and outdoor space. Highly recommend!
great quite stay. nice little fireplace, gas or logs, and it's cozy for the size
If you are looking for a cozy spot with alot of privacy, look no further. Close to everything Blue's and Jazz oriented that Clarksdale has to offer with a country feel all it's own.
Lovely cottage in a beautiful, quiet location but still close to downtown Clarksdale. We had an amazing time.
Great place to stay the night

Our stay at Libby's riverside cottage is always as special as our visit itself.
Our trip to Clarksdale wouldn't be the same without it.
Jim

My husband and I had a wonderful time at this cottage! we brought our baby and Libby left a pack n play at the house for us to use which made packing much easier. The view was very pretty of the trees and the river was a little farther than we thought but still so peaceful. We loved bringing food for smores that we enjoyed around the campfire we made out back! The bed was extremely comfortable and it was very clean. The guest book with local information was very thorough and organized - it was helpful to know where to go for dinner and breakfast the next morning to hear the blues! We had a very relaxing time at this cabin that feels like a home and loved the seculded and quiet location so close to town! Thank you for a fantastic stay!
Nice cozy little home, loved the view and all the amenities it had!
Libby’s place was a sweet spot on the river - great for decompressing after three days on a canoe paddling the Mississippi!
Everything Allright !
A wonderful base to explore the Mississippi delta from! We loved the riverfront setting and the birdwatching from the back!
Very cute eclectic place to stay!! Very comfortable. Libby was easy to communicate with.

The cabin is super chill and quiet. It has a comfy bed and all the amenities you need. Nice big TV with every channel you could hope for. Minimal requests for check out. It’s a must if you are in the area!
Great accommodation, excellent location and fair price. I hope to return soon.

Such a sweet, little cabin in a peaceful environment. We enjoyed all of it and made good use of the board games provided! It was a short stay for us, but just what we needed to escape the hustle and bustle of our lives for a bit. My boys loved the whole place. We all did. Thank you again for sharing it with us.

Libby was very communicative, but also gave us all the space we wanted. The dogs were friendly! The view from the bed window was better than anything you could find on the nice, giant tv on the wall! Close to downtown, with all types of suggestion for things to do. Can’t wait to stay again!
This was a fun, eclectic place to stay with great communication from the host.

We had a wonderful weekend at Libby’s place! The cabin is very cozy and comes with everything you could possibly need for a weekend stay. They obviously put a lot of care into it and it shows. Would love to stay again!

What a cute little perfect place! Lilli is a lovely host, and we had a beautiful little anniversary getaway. Only a few minutes away from everything, very private, quiet neighborhood. Our dogs loved it too. Comfortable bed, really homey feel. Next time we head that way, we'd love to stay again!

The pictures don’t do it justice. The cabin is adorable! It was the perfect weekend getaway, and we will definitely be back. Libby has thought of everything. She was very helpful with any questions I had and with her suggestions. This was my favorite Airbnb experience that we have had.
Great getaway
Great place! Quiet and peaceful, great location. Will definitely be back!
Amazing stay again! Will definitely be back.
Cool spot. Would come again.
Very nice accommodations. A quiet spot on the river not too far from town.
I loved this cottage. Perfect location and so peaceful. I loved the feeling I gathered from staying in the quite location.
Ms. Libby’s place was awesome for our little family during this Holiday Season.
Absolutely loved this special cottage by the river! It was a perfect getaway for my husband and I while visiting family. Best bed I have ever slept in away from home. We will be back!!!

Libby’s cottage by the river was quirky and cozy. Thought we were sleeping on a cloud the bed was so soft and comfy.
Convenient location too, close to historic Clarksdale.
Amazing place! Very close to town and all the music venues but also feels secluded. Would highly recommend.

This place is perfectly located as it is nestled privately in the woods but only a mile from the hustle and bustle. There is all the amenities of being at home and it was easy to feel at home in this space. I’ll definitely be returning. The property is beautiful and inviting and perfect for an individual, like me who was on call at the hospital, or for a weekend getaway with or without kids.
Such a cozy spot you will find it hard to leave. Great proximity to Blues Trail spots and music.
This was a wonderful out of the way place to stay. Everything you need is in the cottage.
Absolutely amazing and well worth the visit
Great place to stay. Easy access to all the music venues

Charming inside, beautiful outside, and very close to Clarksdale’s amenities. We enjoyed our stay and found our host to be extremely accommodating. There are other pets & animals around, so we kept ours leashed outside. Would recommend!
If you are looking for a quiet place off the beaten path, this is for you. Living in a large metropolis it was a welcomed time of solitude yet not far from town.
Just a few miles from downtown and it was delightful. Décor was wonderful and the set up is perfect for a unique and fun get away

Would give 10 stars if I could! All the comforts of Home are here in this cottage. Close to town but this stay has a secluded and unique feel. Beautifully ecclectic decor full of local Delta items and books. We will return for sure!
Very nice place to stay in Clarksdale. It’s close to town but you feel like you’re in the country. Nice view of the grounds. The place was well-stocked and had everything we needed.
Perfect getaway! Very quiet, and very comfortable. The location was great because even though you're only a couple miles away, you felt like you were very far away. Loved it!

We had a wonderful stay at the Sunflower Cottage. The space is decorated with Asian, African, and seaside influences that make you feel like you are on an adventure. The views from the cottage are beautiful and private. The place was stocked with everything you could need, even a variety of milks and creamers for coffee in the morning. We enjoyed a delicious dinner at Levon’s, live music at Ground Zero, and a lively breakfast with music from 19th Street Red and Watermelon Slim at the Bluesberry Cafe. I hope to be back again in the future!

Great little spot off the beaten path in Clarksdale.
WiFi was pretty fast, over 100 mbps. The house was super cozy and well stocked. It was a lot of fun getting to run down the river and explore with our pup, as well as the location has quite a few friendly dogs that are very cute. We saw lots of wildlife, and were so grateful the house came with some bug spray.
The fire pit was nice and easy to use.
Libby was very communicative and accommodating. It was an absolute pleasure staying here.
House was a lot of fun. Wish it wasn’t raining the outside looked like a lot of fun too

Place was great and had everything we needed. Big backyard with view of the Sunflower river. It's a small space but with all the seating and outdoor area it's not cramped feeling. I highly recommend taking the audio walking tour suggested on visitclarksdale.com. Free app and the tour is free. Very informative and will give you good introduction to this little Delta town.

The Sunflower cottage is private, clean and cozy and close to downtown. Libby was quick to respond to questions and had lots of suggestions for things to check out around Clarksdale. We HIGHLY recommend this listing!

Gorgeous, verdant view from the porch and back patio, in such a peaceful and natural setting. A cozy cabin interior, a little old-fashioned in that there are lots of books, pictures and knick-knacks about. Chairs and sofa were all comfortable, and the sleigh bed was particularly comfortable and we got a great night's sleep. The size of the cabin is perfect for a couple, or a couple with one child. More could squeeze in if necessary by using the sofabed, but it would feel tight -- however, there's lot of room to play outdoors. We appreciated being able to bring our dog, and she was greeted by a couple of the neighborhood dogs as well, which was fun after a very long car trip. Kitchen and bathroom are tiny but you have lots of towels, soap and shampoo, etc. -- everything you need.
Great place! Not far from town but secluded enough to relax.

Libby’s place was perfect for our needs. No stairs was a big plus for us & due to rotator cuff surgery the king bed was exactly what we require.
We had everything we needed to cook breakfast. The coffee/kuerig was five star. Safe parking for our Jeep and not having to worry about theft was important.
We will definitely return.

Libby's Cabin on the Sunflower River is amazing. Not far from downtown Clarksdale, it's a beautiful country space that I wish I had spent more time at. The inside of the cabin is like a super cozy hunting lodge vibe as well. Highly recommend.
What an amazing stay! We had the best time sitting on the porch, kayaking, and hanging around in the house. We highly recommend! (and will definitely be back!)
This is a beautifully decorated cottage that provides a wonderful get away for anyone wanting to relax and enjoy some quiet time.

A restful retreat! This cabin feels very homey and private Even though there are other homes nearby, the building faces the river and the outdoor spaces allow you to absorb all the natural beauty around you.

This cottage is amazing. The artwork and decorations are beautiful, cozy and perfectly placed. One painting in particular, I will never forget. The cottage is mind blowing. Every thing you could think of is provided, pardon q-tips (and they were probably there, we just didn't dig). We had a very relaxing Saturday, cooked out and relax like we hadn't relaxed in a long time. Great find!
My favorite place in Clarksdale
Such a great spot. If you get a chance to stay here. Do it. So quiet and relaxing. Loved every minute of it
Love this little place. An unassuming, quaint and quiet retreat.

Libby's place is a nice hideaway in Clarksdale with the feel of being in the woods but very close to the attractions around Clarksdale. Her cat who frequently visited me during my stay was a great unexpected company!
This was my greatest experience with any air bnb. The house was absolutely beautiful and so was the river. The host did an excellent job.

We loved this little cabin which was so warm welcoming and comfy. The bed was dreamy, wood paneling, beautiful rugs, tons of throw pillows, thick towels & nice window coverings made this little cabin feel luxurious, like a little haven right above the river. We made fire in the fire pit and enjoyed the weather. There's a bit of traffic noise but nothing major (I was hoping for owls). I would definitely stay there again. There's room for more people.
Beautiful, peaceful getaway. Place has everything you need! Check it out! We enjoyed it
What a pretty cottage next the the sunflower river! We loved sitting by the fire in the evening and exploring the big yard and river.

The most stylish and comfortable AirBnB I have stayed in yet. Gorgeously decorated, great amenities, very close to downtown Clarksdale and a huge outdoor area on a hill overlooking a small river. BUT THE BEST PART WAS THE BED! My god this thing was like sleeping on a cloud. Most sleep I have gotten in months.
- Tourist Tip: Make sure you visit the Hopson Plantation nearby.
nicest Air BnB I’ve ever stayed in. It was over the top. Will no doubt be back. Top notch place. The most wonderful bed.
A great spot. We had an awesome time. Will definitely visit again!

This cottage is a wonderful getaway from the world while still having modern conveniences and being extremely close to shopping/dining options. The scenery was gorgeous and we spent most of our time outdoors enjoying coffee on the porch or reading by the two fire pits! The cabin is eclectic with Old South memorabilia and artwork/kitsch from around the world. There is almost everything here you could possibly need for whatever type of vacation you're hoping for. The only thing we didn't realize before coming was that the river is quite a ways from the cabin down a relatively steep hill. We walked down there every day with our dogs, who loved the huge yard to run and play in. There was not launching access to the river (the river was quite low while we were there, and it might be different if it were higher). Libby was wonderful, though, finding us other options for launching our kayaks on the river. We would highly recommend this cottage to anyone wanting a weekend getaway and/or passing through/visiting the Clarksdale area.
The place was great. Super cute and chill. A wonderful spot to hang out for a few days with a big backyard and fire pit.

Libby’s place is a gem. Great WiFi, full cable, comfortable space inside and out... air conditioning is glorious! Peaceful to grab a book and read outside or get cozy and comfortable with a movie inside. Highly recommend!
We enjoyed Libby's place and Clarksdale. We used it as an overnight stay on a longer trip, but now that we discovered, it we will be back to spend more time.
Very clean, great view. Had a lovely time in Clarksdale.
This place is great!

Cute little cabin that’s secluded enough that you feel “away from it all,” but still close enough to Clarksdale that you can get what you need.
The water isn’t for swimming, but it’s still a lovely place to chill out, sit by the fire, and unwind (although there are many modern amenities like TV and Wi-Fi if you aren’t quite so rustic), and the cabin has a lot of extras like DVDs, board games, and a pretty well-stocked kitchen. Great for couples or small families!
Excellent place to stay! Was private yet close to town. Check in and check out were simple!
Amazing host and wonderful place to stay
Great space, conveniently located and close to town. Super cozy, secluded getaway.
Very quaint home perfect for a quick stay! Thanks!

Libby's cottage on the river is absolutely beautiful. She has literally thought of everything you will ever need. This cottage sits directly on the river and is surrounded by gorgeous trees. Though the cottage does come with a nice flat screen television, in the week we stayed at Libby's we did not once turn on it on as the views from every vantage point in this cottage were stunning. Lots of bird, lightening bug and deer watching. Libby's place is the place to go when you want to get away and be in tune with nature but still close enough to everything Clarksdale has to offer. There is a large comfy bed that MAKES you relax and two chairs by a large window that beg for you to sit and and reflect. We truly felt like we were home. Libby is a great host and so friendly you'd swear you've been friends for years. We will be back.

My husband and I wanted a random getaway that was withing driving distance of Nashville. Luckily we found Libby's place! It's a little oasis in Clarksdale and has every amenity you could think of. Libby was kind and responsive. The home was beautiful. I loved the decor and it really felt like a home away from home. Would definitely recommend!
libby's place was amazing. great atmosphere and location!
Great location and great responsiveness
Wonderful place!

This cabin is MUCH better in real life. We loved it so much we stayed for an extra night, and wanted to stay even longer. I could go into lots of detail about our stay, but just go for yourself and experience this lovely cabin for yourself.
This was a real highlight on our trip.

This Cottage was the perfect little getaway for my family! The bed is the most comfortable bed ever!!! And we loved all the MS Delta touches throughout the cottage. The location is perfect, very close to downtown! We truly enjoyed our stay and will stay again the next time we are visiting Clarksdale!
Absolutely perfect

Libby’s place is perfect! Super cozy with a great view. It’s only a few minutes drive from downtown Clarksdale where all the restaurants, shops and bars are located. She is very quick to respond and I’ll definitely be coming back soon!
Quirky little property right on the river front. Easy drive from Clarksdale centre. Big bed and very comfortable.

Libby’s place is amazing. We highly recommend a stay there and we will definitely stay there again if we’re in the area. Fully stocked kitchen including bacon and eggs. Who does that? Libby does. Bed was as comfortable as home and WiFi easy to set up. Thanks again Libby

Libby's Sunflower cottage was perfection on the Sunflower River. Cozy, comfortable, clean, great cottage decor, all amenities one needed and 2 fire pits. The King Bed was so comfortable!!! Quiet, down a laneway with only a few other houses. Libby was easy to communicate with and very prompt. Only 2 kilometres from Clarksdale where all the blues happens, a quick taxi ride from CDry.org if you need. Thanks Libby!

Libby's place is truly spectacular. It is located close to town but in the middle of the country. It's much larger than it appears in the picture and the front porch just ads to it. Libby had left a lot of breakfast food. I highly recommend Libby's place.
The sunflower cottage is a beautiful shack in a safe and quiet area. You are at few minutes by car of downtown Clarksdale. It was clean. The bed is confortable. I recommend this place.
I had such an amazing stay. I didn’t want to leave. A home away from home for sure.
We had such a fabulous time!! Everything about this place is amazing! A+A+A+
Libby’s place was fantastic! An excellent place to stay while in the Mississippi delta. The place really captures the feel of this region!

Libby's cottage on the river is truly magical. The moment we walked up, we saw a deer run across the yard and it felt like a good omen. The cottage feels like a log cabin in the woods and it is immaculately decorated with beautiful little flourishes, like the tables made of natural wood and artisan designed coasters. She left us breakfast items and a wealth of coffee options. You could use a Keurig or a traditional coffee maker. She even left out some mosquito repellent that came in handy to use before we headed down to the river which is a stones throw away in the backyard. The yard is huge and we would often sit out on the porch to drink our morning coffee. The Sunflower cottage is very close to the downtown area and was a perfect location for exploring all that Clarksdale has to offer. Libby left us some wonderful tips on things to check out, including the Cathead website that lists all of the music and good restaurants in town. Thank you for your amazing hospitality. We hope we will get a chance to return!
Best regards,
Molly and Joey

Second year staying at the cottage for the Sunflower River music festival. The cottage was again exactly as described. Libby has set up the cottage with a welcoming feel and recommendations for local dining and activities. Would definitely stay here again if we’re back in town.
They’ve thought of everything just in case you forgot anything ☺️

The cottage provides a quiet and relaxing place to unwind. The breakfast items provided were much more than we expected. We enjoyed the decor as well as the outdoor scenery. Very clean with thoughtful touches through out the cottage made our stay perfect.
Great and beautiful location. Cute fun place to stay

We will come back to this charming, adorable shotgun cottage. I am going to steal some decorating ideas. It was so cozy. How lovely inside and out! Fantastic location in Clarksdale, easy to get everywhere.
The Cottage is amazing! I thoroughly enjoyed my stay, and will definitely come again if I find myself back in the Delta. The cottage is spacious, beautiful, and a perfect place to relax.
We had a great time with Libby. great view of the sunflower river, great location, wonderful host, special spot. highly recommended
Great cottage! Loved the location. Libby provided great communication. Make sure to communicate if you’re bringing a dog! Thanks for everything! We absolutely loved it!
Perfectly located and very cozy home with many amenities! Host is very generous, thoughtful and responsive. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience. 10/10 would stay again and again!

A superb location on the banks of the Sunflower River where one of the Delta's oldest plantation families grew cotton for generations. They will share in-depth knowledge of the history, traditions and events of the area. The river cottage offers comfort, character and everything needed for entertainment and relaxation.
What a wonderful place! 5 minutes from town and so many thoughtful touches. We truly enjoyed ourselves and hope to return!

Adorable little cottage! Cozy & comfy with everything you could possibly need including breakfast items left in the fridge. We had a lovely relaxing few days while enjoying the music & hospitality of Clarksdale.
We had a very relaxing night on a long road trip at Libby's! It was nice to be quiet and be able to cook, and do nothing for a while!
Great communication, nice location with river view, and very comfortable bed. Recommended. Thanks

Great communication. The location was convenient to downtown and has a nice view of the river. The bed was very comfortable. The host stocked the refrigerator with all kinds of breakfast items. Recommended. Thanks

The Sunflower cottage is really wonderful and even better than the photos. The views from the big windows of the river were really great. The bed was very comfortable. Lots of thoughtful touches and amenities. We also really appreciated the breakfast items in the fridge.

This is my second stay at the cozy Sunflower cottage. Libby was quick to respond to my requests and even came over to help me with Netflix when I was having an issue. Coffee , juice and cinnamon toast for breakfast. Great shampoo was a plus! Another great visit to this lovely space 😍

This place was private and quiet right on the Sunflower River. I had encountered a few problems during my long term stay and Libby was quick with all her responses and resolved all issues quickly! Libby was a great host and even greeted me with a bottle of wine once I got in! Would recommend staying here if coming to the Clarksdale area.

This is a quiet cabin with all the amenities. Although we did not take advantage there were breakfast items in the fridge, eggs, bacon, milk, coffee, everything you could possibly want. The bed was fantastic and the cabin toasty warm for January.

We absolutely loved it here!
Great space, beautiful spot...
probably wouldn't attempt the nighttime walk into clarksdale downtown again but it was an amazing stay
Great place to stay, great host and convenient location. Looking forward to staying again.
wonderful little cabin! The view was beautiful and it was super relaxing. We enjoyed looking out the large windows, the comfy bed, and the kitchen was the perfect size.
Libby was great as always.
Great space

Loved this little cottage on the river! About a mile or so from town, so feels like you’re getting away from it all - but you’re 10 mins from anything you want to do in Clarksdale. Cute, cute living/bedroom area with books & movies, breakfast stuff in the fridge - great for 2-3 people for a weekend.
Super cute cottage. Libby was a great host. Had everything we needed and more!

This place was so cute and exceeded our expectations! Libby’s hospitality was outstanding even though she herself was out of town on vacation. We booked last minute and everything was ready for us when we got there. The coffee maker was acting up (or we just weren’t using it correctly) and When we got back to the cabin that evening there was an extra one waiting for us on the porch. The home had everything we needed and more thank you!!
This cottage was exactly as described - and exactly what we wanted. Private yet close to Clarksdale. Libby's sister greeted us and we felt incredibly welcome from the start.
Really enjoyed this stay! Would definitely come back!
This is now my favorite place to stay in Clarksdale! Super close to all the venues and museums. The cottage is so charming and cozy and very private; perfect for our quick weekend getaway!

Cool, well decorated cabin on the river with a nice bamboo grove and an ultra-comfortable king bed. Nice touches with things like coffee, tea and breakfast items in the fridge/freezer. Feels secluded and gorgeous view of the river from your bed.

A quiet getaway but only a short drive to the bars and restaurants, you’ll love this cabin by the water. It was beautifully decorated, very very comfortable beds, and even breakfast staples! I wouldn’t recommend anywhere else for a respite and an ideal weekend away!
Loved this beautiful, quiet place!
Libby’s place was such a peaceful little oasis! Her hospitality was second to none and the space was unique and special.
Clean, comfortable accommodations with everything we needed. Lots of local live music nearby, but peace and quiet at the cottage. Great place to stay!
This place was great! Secluded but still close enough to town.
What a beautiful place to stay. The Sunflower Cottage may be my favorite place to stay ever!

Just a great place to stay.Comfortable, and relaxing, but close(driving or taxi)to some great places to hear music.
It was the highlight of our trip around Louisiana, <Mississippi and Texas.

Libby' cabin was great! Ouside of Clarksdale but still all the charm of the Mississippi Delta! It was great to go into Clarksdale, have a great night...then come back to Libby's cabin and relax! Cute ... comfortable. . cool...!! Highly recommend ..can't wait to come back

The New Roxy used to be my favorite place in Clarksdale but now it's Libby's. This place is so cool you almost forget you came to take in Clarksdale and the rest of the Mississippi Delta. If you're visiting The Delta you want to stay here, just not on the same week I need cuz I'm coming back.

Libby's "shotgun shack" is anything but a shack! We loved staying in her stylishly decorated and amply outfitted cottage. We will definitely visit again. The lodging is private, quiet, secure and only a mile from everything you go to Clarksville for. Keep up the great hospitality Libby.
A super cottage. Very well appointed in a beautiful location. Lovely to meet Libby and share some time. A unique airbnb in a magic town. We would definitely love to stay here again.

Lovely secluded cottage tucked away in a little river glen filled with interesting eclectic decor books films and games outside amenities and more food available then you could possibly consume. Many thoughtful touches throughout this charming cottage.
Everything thing you could want and more. The breakfast food was a great touch.
We are already looking for an excuse to go back to Clarksdale so we can stay here again!:)
Libby's place is delightful. It's incredibly comfortable, cute and homely. I didn't want to leave.
Just amazing! We enjoyed our stay in this sweet little cottage hide-away. Libby is a wonderful hostess.

The cottage is in such a quiet, private neighborhood yet isn’t too far from the downtown area with restaurants, etc. it is uniquely rural with modern touches. Libby has made the cottage very appealing and comfortable.

Space was clean, excellent variety of options for breakfast foods and beverages. I loved the added touch of having plenty of toiletries available as well in case we forgot something. I thought the bed was comfortable, and I liked having various options for relaxing indoors and outdoors.
Lovely space with many touches for comfort and beauty.
